entry.title: The Bonds that Bind
entry.summary:
Author: applejuice382

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 143,838Chapters: 13/16Kudos: 516

Summary: Stiles is just trying to prevent the next supernatural problem from gracing their doorstep. Derek is just trying to keep his pack alive (and ignore the desperation that crawls under his skin whenever Stiles is near).When Stiles goes into the preserve to investigate a string of murders, he and Derek are kidnapped by an unknown group and locked in a basement with no escape. Each night brings new suffering and torture, and each day they have only each other.The two will have to learn how to lean on one another to keep their sanity intact, and they’ll have to work together to escape.Too bad they annoy the shit out of each other.

entry.title: from the rooftops
entry.summary:
Author: sterek24 (mooncry89)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,738Chapters: 15/17Kudos: 560

Summary: Stiles Stilinski moved to Poland after the events of the Nogitsune. He's been away from Beacon Hills ever since. Now, several years later, he's back and he's bringing a few familiar faces with him. The Nemeton has been visiting Stiles's dreams, telling him he needs to come home - so that's what he's going to do. Oh, and he's going to rebuild the Hale Pack, too, no matter what True Alpha Scott McCall thinks about that.

entry.title: Way To Home
entry.summary:
Author: SonGolifreya

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,318Chapters: 6/31Kudos: 20

Summary: Anuk Ite has been defeated, and all the pack members finally got the rest they longed for. It would’ve been that way if Theo hadn’t, for some reason, taken up his claws again. It’s time to unravel the mystery of why one of the strongest alphas, Talia Hale, could have been deceived by Kate. Is Kate really involved in the fire? Will Theo find his place in Beacon Hills? How many times will Liam punch him in the face? The guys have to sort out all these problems without killing each other.---“Take my hand and show the way home."

entry.title: The Hunt for the Argent Codex
entry.summary:
Author: Ticket_to_Insanity

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,485Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Hunters across the globe are seeking the Argent Codex - a mythical book said to hold spells, maps, and rituals that can tip the supernatural balance. After a mysterious group attacks Scott and steals a page from Deaton's collection, Stiles is forced to team up with Derek, who recently returned to Beacon Hills tracking the same cult.The two set off on a road trip across old supernatural sites to stop the cult from reassembling the Codex. Between magical threats, near-death experiences, and cramped motel rooms, their antagonism starts giving way to something hotter... and far more dangerous.

entry.title: Pack and Proud
entry.summary:
Author: WolfFeller

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 959Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 4

Summary: The Beacon Hills crew celebrates Pride in full color, marching in a vibrant parade filled with love, glitter, chaos, and found family. Everyone shows up in their own unique way—loud, proud, and absolutely themselves. There’s teasing, flirting, declarations, and quiet moments of unity as the group embraces joy, identity, and each other.

entry.summary:

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 76,751Chapters: 21/38Kudos: 30

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.

entry.title: Unveiled
entry.summary:
Author: Dexterous_Sinistrous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,348Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 95

Summary: Stiles’ hands were shaking as he took a handful of his veil, though he wished he could act bravely and just tear the material off. He slowly began to lift the veil, his heartbeat racing as he continued to look at the Alpha through the material.'There isn’t another way', Stiles reassured himself.His veil felt heavier than it should as he lifted it over his chin.Calloused hands grasped Stiles’ wrists in a tight hold.Stiles was startled, his actions halted. His veil was hanging just below his lips as he observed the Alpha.~*~Or, can love blossom while hidden by a veil?

entry.title: Blood Magick
entry.summary:
Author: misfitmonarchy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,581Chapters: 6/7Kudos: 105

Summary: “Freeze! You--” Derek lunges and catches the wildling’s ankle. He grins, all teeth, and yanks the scrambling man so that the wildling’s body falls flat. It’s not too uncommon to find wildlings outside of cities, but they tended to wander the trade routes or at least areas with better shelter.The wildling’s arms are strong enough to fight back, and if he weren’t inhibited by his wolf’s strength, Derek presumes it would be quite a fight. As it were, he pinned the thief easily, chest down and flailing like a huffing like an animal.“Have nothing to say, thief?”--Derek and his pack of werewolves are fur traders working their way through the winter trading route when one evening, a thief is discovered after stealing their wares. Caught red handed, they take the thief prisoner and discover that the thief is much more than he seems

entry.title: Lay My Curses Out to Rest
entry.summary:
Author: sponfawn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,952Chapters: 11/14Kudos: 63

Summary: "Are you there, God? It's me, Stiles. Look, I know I never really went to Mass or anything like a good Polish kid but could you do me a big one and have this whole thing be entirely Not related to the supernatural - hell, it could be super cartel related but no shapeshifters, or chaos spirits, or fear monsters, or deranged Hunters, or fucking human sacrifices of any kind. Just do this for once and I'll do whatever. Well, not whatever, but I dunno I'll be a good son. You like that “honor thy father” stuff, right? I'll honor the fuck out of my dad, even come to visit more often! Confucius will weep at the intensity of my filial piety. Deal? Just. PLEASE."It's 2027 - a decade since Stiles was last in Beacon Hills - and the FBI has sent Stiles back to investigate a smuggling case.ORIn which I attempt to write the kind of story I want to read. A future Sterek fic that: 1) is in character, 2) doesn't bash any characters, 3) fixes Davis' timeline, 4) doesn't have sex, 5) has some character interactions that don't just revolve around Sterek/Stiles/Derek, and 6) addresses Derek and Stiles' unique traumas.

entry.title: Third Time's The Charm
entry.summary:
Author: novasillies

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 247,629Chapters: 19/46Kudos: 123

Summary: "You're a person people are better off without."Theo's words struck hard and deep. The claws of them dug in and twisted; mangled him relentlessly."That's not on me."-Stiles goes back in time again to stop the Hale House fire. It rings true for the rest of his life that he seems to break more than he fixes.Updates! Every! Thursday! Except for when it doesn’t

entry.title: Run
entry.summary:
Author: Ivy Posion (viletty)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,333Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 22

Summary: She ran.She ran from her past, from her present and hopefully her future. Hoping beyond all hell that the darkness inside her didn't consume her. That the blood at her feet would stop rising.That the beast chasing at her heels would never catch her.So she ran. With no hope of rest.That is until they finally stopped her.I SUCK at summaries. It's interesting I promise. This was originally a one-shot songfic based on Danity Kane - Stay with me.
